snippet: Karl Rove, the Republican operative, insisted that the ghosts of the 2000 race prompted him to act.
abstract: On-air confrontation between Karl Rove and Fox network's team of voting analysts over Ohio's voter results drew renewed focus on Republican operative's complicated and conflicting roles in presidential campaign; Rove insists he was motivated by concern over premature network calls, stemming from networks' botched Florida results in 2000.
lead_paragraph: Karl Rove, the Republican operative, insisted that the ghosts of the 2000 race prompted him to act.

headline.seo: Rove’s On-Air Rebuttal of Fox Ohio Vote Call Raises Questions About His Role
headline.main: Rove’s On-Air Rebuttal of Fox’s Ohio Vote Call Raises Questions About His Role
headline.print_headline: Rove’s On-Air Rebuttal of Fox’s Ohio Vote Call Raises Questions About His Role
